title: >>> The WAITING ROOM
body_text:
THE THEME SONG
After much deliberation, the DODGEBALL 20 theme song has finally been chosen. Many of you remember the DODGEBALL X theme song "Mudshovel" by Staind. DODGEBALL 20 has hit the jackpot with a song by Filter most would know called "Hey Man, Nice Shot".
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
THE QUESTIONS
Some of the biggest icons ever to step foot on the dodgeball court have given their views and thoughts on the past and the future. Here are only a fraction of the responses:
> What was your favorite dodgeball event?
"The 'Double Header' (XONE and XTWO) in November."
- KRISTIN DRISCOLL
"DODGEBALL VII when it first rained. That was awesome; pure fun."
- CHRIS ADAMS
"My favorite was DODGEBALL X. The ceremony was awesome, the weather was pretty optimal for late October, and Steve Adams in a mask and green cape makes any dodgeball event better."
- DAN SPENGEMAN
> What is/was your favorite rivalry?
"Justin Pierce and Diana DiBuccio."
- STEVE ADAMS
"John and Fitz or me and Diana."
- SARA DECUIR
"Who do you think? God, I hate you Tom (lol)."
- LENNY HERERA
"My favorite rivalry was with Derek Carty. Even though we're pretty strong allies now, we loved going up against each other in the first few events we were at together."
- TOM ADAMS
Once again, this is only a few of the answers given that pertain to the questions sent in everyones' email last week. Answer the Qs and get your responses posted! There are plenty more to come!
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
With just 4 days remaining, one cannot imagine the emotion and excitement that has been brewing in the mind and heart of KJohn Tronolone. In just days time, similarly to the DODGEBALL X preview on October 23rd, KJohn will address all players right here on the dodgeball website.

THE THEME SONG

Some of the biggest icons ever to step foot on the dodgeball court have given their views and thoughts on the past and the future. Here are only a fraction of the responses:
